metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11989 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Apache Shiro before 1.5.3, when using Apache Shiro with Spring dynamiccontrollers, a specially crafted request may cause an authenticationbypass.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11989` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-3~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shiro package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-3~18.04.1').
